    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disintegration Bolt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3392)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 301 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** bolt

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The shaft of this bolt is scorched and blackened, and handling it coats your fingers with a fine black powder. When an activated _disintegration bolt_  hits a target, it's subject to a [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1492) spell requiring a DC 34 Fortitude save. As with the spell, a critical hit on the attack roll causes the target's saving throw outcome to be one degree worse.

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1492).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Disintegration Bolt
